lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Time for another display of unmatched skill from Nuck Chorris!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Anyways, you got any more special tricks up your sleeve?

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: I've heard humans can "bust a move" by pressing [X]!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: It'll sure catch our attention - and piss off some of our fighters...

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: ... but you can take the heat, right?

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Leave? Surely not - onto the next arena! Your adoring fans await!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: You can do better than that! We believe in you!
